about_the_game:
Protect the Realm of Fryth

Hailing from the Cobalt Kingdom at the center of the continent, Wes has always aspired to be a hero. When his mentor, a royal knight, is struck down, Wes' wish might just come true.

WyshBound is an action-adventure RPG across a realm of eccentric kingdoms. Meet companions equipped with unique abilities, solve challenging puzzles, and collect powerful flowers to defeat the villainous Fangor.

Game Features

- Classic 2D top-down gameplay

- A nostalgic, hand-drawn art style

- Meet companions! Throughout your journey, you will meet new adventurers with unique abilities.

short_description: A great knight is all that stands between his kingdom and demise. Wes…is his squire. When the villainous Fangor defeats the great knight, Wes is the only one who can avenge his mentor. Gather a party of friends, solve unique puzzles, and collect the realm’s gifted flowers in this hand-drawn RPG!
